1370: Saswe was born in Breestraat in 1370.

1375: Gave birth to Heinkin in 1375 at age 21.
1376: Gave birth to Alebaren in 1376 at age 22.
1377: Gave birth to Emmelina in 1377 at age 23.
1378: Lost daughter Margareta when Margareta was 0 years old.

Lost son Heinkin when Heinkin was 4 years old.
1383: Gave birth to Loduicus in 1383 at age 29.
1386: Lost daughter Emmelina when Emmelina was 10 years old.
